description:
After a long journey, Ushio returns to Tokyo to continue his normal life. He is greeted happily by Asako, Mayuko and his other classmates. He also runs into a mysterious boy named Kirio, who leaves him with a strange message. Meanwhile, one of Hakumen no Mono`s avatars, Kuragi, appears at the main temple of the Kouhamei Sect. Ushio is summoned by his father to help in the battle, but nothing seems to work. And then, the one who finally turned the tables was...
Source: crunchyroll
